title: Management Team | Phoenix Technologies
meta_description: Our experienced management team brings together diverse backgrounds, deep expertise, and a proven track record of success. United by a shared vision, they drive Phoenix Technologies forward with innovation, leadership, and dedication.

team_members.name: Thomas Taroni
team_members.title: Group CEO Phoenix Technologies
team_members.description: Thomas Taroni, the Executive Chairman and co-founder of Phoenix Technologies, has been a driving force in the IT hardware and software industry.

team_members.name: Carla Bünger
team_members.title: Vice President of the Board and Founder
team_members.description: Carla Bünger, co-founder and Vice-Chairwoman of Phoenix Technologies, is recognized as one of Switzerland's Digital Shapers.

team_members.name: Angel Nunez Mencias
team_members.title: Board Member and CEO
team_members.description: Angel Nunez Mencias is the Group's Chief Technical/Client Officer (CTO/CCO) of Phoenix Technologies AG.

image.alt: Profile picture of Angel Nunez Mencias

team_members.name: Stefan Taroni
team_members.title: Chief Operating Officer
team_members.description: Stefan Taroni serves as Chief Operating Officer at Phoenix Technologies.

team_members.name: Maddalena Schmid
team_members.title: Chief Human Resources Officer
team_members.description: Maddalena Schmid serves as Chief Human Resources Officer at Phoenix Technologies.

team_members.name: Nicolai Brignoli
team_members.title: Chief Revenue Officer
team_members.description: Nicolai Brignoli serves as Chief Revenue Officer at Phoenix Technologies.

team_members.name: Reto Oeschger
team_members.title: Chief Financial Officer
team_members.description: Reto Oeschger serves as Chief Financial Officer at Phoenix Technologies.

headings.text: We Make AI Work For You

main_content: Phoenix Technologies Team Our experienced management team brings together diverse backgrounds, deep expertise, and a proven track record of success. United by a shared vision, they drive Phoenix Technologies forward with innovation, leadership, and dedication. Why Phoenix We aim to establish the Sovereign Cloud driving digital transformation, catalyzing innovation, and fortifying resilience for Switzerland’s organizations over the next generations. Join the Team Download  (undefined, 0 B) Management Team Thomas Taroni Group CEO Phoenix Technologies Send email Open linkedin profile Carla Bünger Vice President of the Board and Founder Send email Angel Nunez Mencias Board Member and CEO Send email Stefan Taroni Chief Operating Officer Send email Maddalena Schmid Chief Human Resources Officer Send email Nicolai Brignoli Chief Revenue Officer Send email Reto Oeschger Chief Financial Officer Send email Full Team At the heart of Phoenix Technologies is our dedicated team — a diverse group of engineers, creators, and innovators united by a shared mission: building secure, sovereign, and future-ready cloud and AI solutions from Switzerland. Their expertise, passion, and relentless drive power everything we do. You have questions for the team? Do not hesitate to contact us.
